entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is trying out for the Quidditch team.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and also trying out for the Quidditch team. He has been practicing keeping as Keeper.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends who are both trying out for the Quidditch team.
Ron is a brother of Fred, who is also part of the Weasley family.
Ron is a brother of George, who is also part of the Weasley family.
Harry's Quaffle is being bewitched to fly at him by Ron.
Ron is participating in the tryouts for the Quidditch team.
Fred and George are teasing Ron about his lack of skill as Keeper.
